name: fastidiously
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that gives too much attention to small details and wants everything to be correct and perfect: fastidiously dressed These were the rules, and she stuck fastidiously by them. He took it apart and examined it fastidiously.
in a way that shows that you have a very strong dislike of anything dirty or unpleasant: fastidiously clean He wiped his hands fastidiously between mouthfuls. See
fastidious
More examplesFewer examplesHe was fastidiously tidy.The stories were fastidiously detailed in his grandmother's journal.Fastidiously planned gardens surrounded the museum.
